definition: shining with an unnatural red glow as of fire seen through smoke
details:
adjective
- shining with an unnatural red glow as of fire seen through smoke
= example: shining with an unnatural red glow as of fire seen through smoke
- ghastly pale
= example: ghastly pale
- glaringly vivid and graphic
= synonyms: shocking
- horrible in fierceness or savagery
= example: horrible in fierceness or savagery
